name: Sweeng!
description:
Good Day, everyone~  We are Youme Project team just released a new hyper casual game for Android Play Store called Sweeng! 

Sweeng is a  fun jump and swing game to test your puzzle solving and... patient.

SIMPLE CONTROL
1. Tap to jump
2. Tap and hold while in air to grip on the rope
3. Release your finger to jump again

AMAZING LEVELS
Play up to 18 levels (will be updated) to test your skill and become a sweeng pro!

CUTE CHARACTER
Character is Kurei Kei (Pronama-chan), a maskot character of Pronama (pronama.jp).
Voiced by Uesaka Sumire.

Let's swing to the finish line and collect all coins with Pronama-chan!
Happy sweeng!

Become our Patron on Patreon here :
